alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 1:24AM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches possible. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could become hazardous again Friday into Saturday with snow packed roads and poor visibility in snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
